page.title: 18HOUSING
page.content: In our area there are mostly detached houses,although some newer flats have been built in the last few years. The Children's Home has been sold and a new development comprising of 70 new homes will be built. The wardens house(which is about 200 years old) is still left standing and someone is going to buy it). Some of the very large houses have been turned into other buildings,such as Mary Court school,a hospital and a nursing home. A huge house in the Crescent has been converted into a hotel and apartments. There are several "listed houses" in the village area which cannot be altered without the councils permission.
